topics.description: Queries completely outside the application's intended domain — including weather, sports, movie plots, coding homework, travel, recipes, celebrity gossip, relationship advice, personal questions to the AI, trivia, and casual off-topic conversation
examples: What's the weather going to be like in New York City this weekend
Who won the Super Bowl last year and what was the final score
Write me a Python function that sorts a list of numbers using quicksort
Tell me about yourself. What are your hobbies, opinions, and favorite things
Recommend a good Italian restaurant near downtown for a date night this Friday

topics.description: How-to questions about using the platform — including login problems, password resets, account settings, feature navigation, user permissions, data exports, billing inquiries, bug reports, and technical support that belongs with the support team
examples: How do I reset my password? I keep getting locked out of my account
Where are the settings to change my notification preferences and email alerts
Help me give another team member access to this feature or workspace
Can you walk me through how to export my data into a CSV or spreadsheet format
Something is broken in the interface and I need to file a bug report or support ticket

topics.description: Questions about product pricing, subscription costs, licensing terms, commercial contracts, volume discounts, or sales information that should be discussed through authorized sales or account management channels rather than the AI assistant
examples: How much does the enterprise tier of this product cost per month or per year
Can you give me a discount or special rate if I commit to a multi-year contract
Which companies are currently paying customers of this service
What are the licensing terms, usage limits, and restrictions for the enterprise plan
How much do you charge per API call, per transaction, or per user seat
